name: You are [UN] Dead, Enjoy Your Stay
name_original: You are [UN] Dead, Enjoy Your Stay
description:
[[HEADPHONES RECOMMENDED, SOUND IN GAME IS VERY QUIET]]

You have been peacefully dead for an eternity now, until a Lich comes around and resurrects you. Not only did he disturb your peaceful slumber, he botched the resurrection spell! Now your flesh falls off whenever you move. Time to kill that Lich so you can finally get some quality dead-ing time.

Make your way through a dungeon with randomized enemies, upgrading your stats and blood magic spells along the way. Death is not a setback, you can come back each time stronger!

Controls:

WASD: move

Space: jump

Left Click: shoot

Q/E: swap between equipped spells

Esc: (not fully implemented) pause

(The project code became a bit of a mess towards the end but if you want to look through and give some tips/ criticism on the coding I would very much appreciate it)
